DIA_13370_Hobo_PoorRecipe_03_01: Hey, kid! Want to know a secret recipe?
DIA_13370_Hobo_PoorRecipe_03_02: I used to be a chef and cooked deliciously!
DIA_13370_Hobo_PoorRecipe_03_03: Give me some gold and you'll see for yourself!
DIA_13370_Hobo_ItIsNotATrick_03_03: You take two weeds and throw them in the pot!
DIA_13370_Hobo_ItIsNotATrick_03_04: Once they are cooked, you can eat them!
DIA_13370_Hobo_ItIsNotATrick_03_05: Oh such a secret is worth more!
DIA_13370_Hobo_ItIsScam_03_03: Buy the ingredients from me and see for yourself!
DIA_13370_Hobo_YesItIsScam_Description: I want to buy weeds. (Give 20 GP)
DIA_13370_Hobo_YesItIsScam_03_03: Oh, I don't think you have enough gold!
